name: Hellcraze
description:
Hellcraze is a bullethell dungeon crawler game, your mission is simple... KILL THEM ALL!
Each level features new enemies and harder challenge!
You have a variety of guns to defeat the demons!
Feast on their soul and upgrade your gear to get stronger!

Bosses will be waiting to defeat you as you crawl your way through hell!
Defeat all of them and free the world of the evil!
